info.desc: This is what the intersection looks like when facing northward.
info.instr: Go to Nolte Center Garage. Make your way towards the west-most point.

info.desc: This is the door exiting from the Northrop Garage area north.
info.instr: There should be a door that leads to a short hall with stairs, go left.

info.desc: This is the path you came from if coming from Northrop Garage.
info.instr: Through a door this leads to an intersection (the first picture).

info.desc: This is the East wall of Northrop garage, it will be on your left.
info.instr: You will be coming from the center path, so you will keep going straight.

info.desc: This is the door you come from when entering Morrill.
info.instr: This is a long path, you will curve to the let twice (there won't be other paths, just a door labeled to Northrop).

info.desc: This is the area you will be in after entering Morrill.
info.instr: At the end is a door, of which is pictured (the view is if you turn around after going through it).
Going straight from that door and taking a right into where there's a security arm you walk past that, which is pictured if you turned around.
Taking a right from here, you walk straight until you get to Northrop garage, to the left will be a wall with Morrill hall painted on it, and on the opposite Johnston Hall
Enter the door on the Morrill Hall wall and walk up the stairs through another door
Past a hallway on our left you will enter an area of Morrill with an elevator on your left.
